shillelagh.internal

Class ShillelaghUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • shillelagh.internal.ShillelaghUtil

  • public final class ShillelaghUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of utility functions used by code generated by shillelagh.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> byte[] serialize(T object)
        Takes an object and serializes it to a byte array.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to serialize. Must implement Serializable
        Returns:
        The object as a byte array.

      • deserialize

        public static <K> K deserialize(byte[] bytes)
        De-serialize a byte array back to it's original object.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The type the bytes should be serialised back too.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The bytes that where serialized from an object.
        Returns:
        The de-serialized object.

      • createInstance

        public static <T> T createInstance(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Takes a class type and constructs it. If the class does not have an empty constructor this will find the parametrized constructor and use nulls and default values to construct the class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the class to construct.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to construct.
        Returns:
        The constructed object.
